title: WHIRLING / DREAM1
description: Adrift in an alcohol induced oblivion, the faculties of your mind speak to you.

dialogueTree.title: Ancient Reptilian Brain: "There is nothing. Only warm, primor..."
dialogueTree.english: There is nothing. Only warm, primordial blackness. Your conscience ferments in it -- no larger than a single grain of malt. You don't have to do anything anymore.
dialogueTree.polish: Nie ma niczego. Tylko ciepły, pierwotny mrok. Twoja świadomość powoli w nim fermentuje, nie większa niż ziarnko słodu. Nie musisz już robić niczego.
dialogueTree.belarusian: Нічога няма. Толькі цёплая, спрадвечная цемра. Твая свядомасць павольна ў ёй ферментуецца — не большая за зярнятка соладу. Табе больш не трэба нічога рабіць.

links.title: Ancient Reptilian Brain: "Ever."
links.english: Ever.
links.polish: Nigdy.
links.belarusian: Ніколі.

links.title: Ancient Reptilian Brain: "Never ever."
links.english: Never ever.
links.polish: Przenigdy.
links.belarusian: Аніколі.

links.title: You: "Never ever ever?"
links.english: Never ever ever?
links.polish: Nigdy przenigdy?
links.belarusian: Ніколі-аніколі?

links.title: Ancient Reptilian Brain: "Never ever ever ever, baby!"
links.english: Never ever ever ever, baby!
links.polish: Nigdy, nigdy, przenigdy, dziecinko!
links.belarusian: Ніколі-ніколі-аніколі, дзетка!

links.title: You: "(Simply keep on non-existing.)"
links.english: (Simply keep on non-existing.)
links.polish: (Po prostu nie istniej dalej).
links.belarusian: (Проста не існаваць далей).

links.title: Ancient Reptilian Brain: "An inordinate amount of time passes..."
links.english: An inordinate amount of time passes.  It is utterly void of struggle. No ex-wives are contained within it.
links.polish: Mija niepomierna ilość czasu. Jest on absolutnie wolny od cierpień. Nie zawierają się w nim żadne eks-żony.
links.belarusian: Мiнае празмерная колькасць часу. Яна абсалютна вольна ад намаганняў. У ёй не змяшчаюцца ніякія былыя жонкі.

links.title: You: "This is great!"
links.english: This is great!
links.polish: Coś pięknego!
links.belarusian: Гэта цудоўна!

links.title: Ancient Reptilian Brain: "Yes. It. Is."
links.english: Yes. It. Is.
links.polish: Tak. Właśnie tak.
links.belarusian: Так. Гэта. Так.

links.title: You: "Gimme some more."
links.english: Gimme some more.
links.polish: Dawaj tego więcej.
links.belarusian: Давай яшчэ.

links.title: Ancient Reptilian Brain: "You got it, sweet brother! Nothing..."
links.english: You got it, sweet brother! Nothing upon nothing, upon nothing!
links.polish: Jasna sprawa, braciszku! Nic podlane niczym na bazie niczego!
links.belarusian: Уцяміў, любы браце! Няма нічога ў нічым, зусім анічога!

links.title: You: "I like nothing."
links.english: I like nothing.
links.polish: Lubię nic.
links.belarusian: Я люблю нічога.

links.title: Ancient Reptilian Brain: "I know you do, baby... I know..."
links.english: I know you do, baby... I know...
links.polish: Wiem o tym, dziecinko... Wiem o tym.
links.belarusian: Я ведаю пра гэта, дзетка... Я ведаю...

links.title: You: "How about you cough up some more of..."
links.english: How about you cough up some more of that sweet oblivion?
links.polish: Może zapodasz mi trochę więcej tego słodkiego nieistnienia?
links.belarusian: Можа, дадаш мне крыху больш гэтага салодкага забыцця?

links.title: Ancient Reptilian Brain: "Coming right up, sir. Smooth passag..."
links.english: Coming right up, sir. Smooth passage...
links.polish: Już się robi, proszę pana. Spokojny rejs...
links.belarusian: Ужо робім, спадар. Добрага шляху...

links.title: You: "Allons-y, let's go!"
links.english: Allons-y, let's go!
links.polish: Allons-y, lecimy!
links.belarusian: Allons-y, ляцім!

links.title: Ancient Reptilian Brain: "All right. Nothingtown to Fuck-All-..."
links.english: All right. Nothingtown to Fuck-All-Borough!
links.polish: W porządku. Z Nigdziejowa do Nigdylandii!
links.belarusian: Добра. З Ябенічаў у Залупенічы!

links.title: You: "A return trip to The Silence please..."
links.english: A return trip to The Silence please!
links.polish: Poproszę o podróż powrotną w wielką ciszę!
links.belarusian: Падарожжа туды й назад ў Вялікую Цішу, калі ласка!

links.title: Ancient Reptilian Brain: "Do you want me to upgrade that into..."
links.english: Do you want me to upgrade that into a *one way trip*, sir?
links.polish: Czy życzyłby pan sobie podnieść standard podróży do wersji *w jedną stronę*?
links.belarusian: Ці хацелі б вы палепшыць стандарт паездкі да версіі *у адзін бок*?

links.title: You: "Don't stop, keep singing. Sing me t..."
links.english: Don't stop, keep singing. Sing me the song of death.
links.polish: Nie przestawaj, śpiewaj dalej. Śpiewaj mi pieśń śmierci.
links.belarusian: Не спыняйся, спявай далей. Спявай мне песню смерці.

links.title: You: "Wait, no! I need to belittle myself..."
links.english: Wait, no! I need to belittle myself instead.
links.polish: Zaraz, nie! Muszę sobie zamiast tego umniejszać.
links.belarusian: Стойце, не! Мне трэба зневажаць сябе замест гэтага.

links.title: You: "Let's visit the ancient Zero-Holm!"
links.english: Let's visit the ancient Zero-Holm!
links.polish: Odwiedźmy pradawne Miasto Początku!
links.belarusian: Давайце наведаем старажытны горад Пачатку!

links.title: Ancient Reptilian Brain: "Great choice, elder one. It has alw..."
links.english: Great choice, elder one. It has always been like this -- and it always will.
links.polish: Wspaniały wybór, o starszy. Zawsze tak było. I zawsze będzie.
links.belarusian: Цудоўны выбар, старэйшы. Заўсёды так было. І заўсёды будзе.

links.title: You: "Look, there's *I Am Tired of Being..."
links.english: Look, there's *I Am Tired of Being This Type of Animal* and Who-Gives-a-Shit!
links.polish: Proszę, oto *ktoś, kto nie chce być już takim zwierzęciem* i ktoś, kogo obchodzą rzeczy!
links.belarusian: Глядзі, а вось *Я Стаміўся Быць Гэтай Жывёлай* і хтосьці, каго цікавяць рэчы!

links.title: Ancient Reptilian Brain: "Not you! Your days of giving a shit..."
links.english: Not you! Your days of giving a shit and being that type of animal are over.
links.polish: To nie ty! Czasy, kiedy coś cię obchodziło i byłeś takim zwierzęciem, to już przeszłość.
links.belarusian: Гэта не ты! Часы, калі цябе нешта клапаціла і ты быў такім жывёлам, ужо ў мінулым.

links.title: You: "I want to get off now, I like pain..."
links.english: I want to get off now, I like pain and burning light and wanting things from people who don't want to give them to me.
links.polish: Chcę już wysiąść. Lubię ból i palące światło i lubię też chcieć od ludzi rzeczy, których nie chcą mi dać.
links.belarusian: Хачу ўжо выйсці. Люблю боль і пякучае святло, і люблю таксама хацець ад людзей рэчы, якія яны мне не хочуць даваць.

links.title: Ancient Reptilian Brain: "Do you really?"
links.english: Do you really?
links.polish: Na pewno?
links.belarusian: Вядома?

links.title: You: "Don't be naive, of course not. I wa..."
links.english: Don't be naive, of course not. I want to sail the inky blackness until forever ends!
links.polish: No co ty, jasne, że nie. Chcę żeglować po atramentowym mroku, póki nie skończy się wieczność!
links.belarusian: Ну што ты, вядома, не. Хачу плыць па чарнільнай цемры, пакуль не скончыцца вечнасць!

links.title: Ancient Reptilian Brain: "The song of death is sweet and endl..."
links.english: The song of death is sweet and endless... But what is this? Somewhere in the sore, bloated *man-meat* around you -- a sensation!
links.polish: Pieśń śmierci jest kojąca i nieskończona... Ale co to? Gdzieś w otaczającym cię obolałym, zapuchniętym *ludzkim mięsie*... odczucie!
links.belarusian: Песня смерці лагодная і бясконцая... Але што гэта? Недзе ў атачаючым цябе балючым, апухлым *чалавечым мясе*... адчуванне!

links.title: Ancient Reptilian Brain: "Like a fly to the ointment, your co..."
links.english: Like a fly to the ointment, your conscience sticks to it. The limbed and headed machine of pain and undignified suffering is firing up again. It wants to walk the desert. Hurting. Longing. Dancing to disco music.
links.polish: Twoja świadomość przykleja się do niego jak mucha do lepu. Machina bólu i pozbawionego godności cierpienia odpala ponownie, a wraz z nią jej kończyny i głowa. Chce kroczyć przez pustynię. Cierpieć. Tęsknić. Tańczyć do muzyki disco.
links.belarusian: Твая свядомасць прыляпляецца да яго, як муха да смаляной пасткі. Машына болю і пазбаўленых годнасці пакут запускаецца зноў, а разам з ёй яе канечнасці і галава. Яна жадае крочыць праз пустыню. Пакутаваць. Сумаваць. Танчыць пад музыку дыска.

links.title: Volition: "You can take it, you're a Champion!"
links.english: You can take it, you're a Champion!
links.polish: Dasz radę, jesteś mistrzem!
links.belarusian: Ты справішся, ты чэмпіён!

links.title: You: "Mother, help me, there's a head att..."
links.english: Mother, help me, there's a head attached to my neck and I'm *in* it.
links.polish: O mamo, pomóż, do mojej szyi ktoś zamocował głowę, a ja jestem w jej *wnętrzu*.
links.belarusian: Ой, мамачка, дапамажы, да майго шыі нехта прымацаваў галаву, а я знаходжуся ў яе *ўнутры*.

links.title: Limbic System: "The stench of liquor rises from you..."
links.english: The stench of liquor rises from your mouth. And with it -- an *un-godly* headache.
links.polish: Z twoich ust unosi się do nosa odór alkoholu. A wraz z nim pojawia się *potworny* ból głowy.
links.belarusian: З тваіх вус у нос падымаецца пах спіртнога. А разам з ім з'яўляецца *страшэнны* галаўны боль.

links.title: You: "Help! Someone! Cut my head off, it'..."
links.english: Help! Someone! Cut my head off, it's trying to murder the rest of me!
links.polish: Na pomoc! Ratunku! Odetnijcie mi głowę, próbuje zamordować całą resztę mnie!
links.belarusian: На дапамогу! Ратуйце! Адрэжце мне галаву, спрабуе забіць усіх астатніх мяне!

links.title: Limbic System: "A fiery streak penetrates your skul..."
links.english: A fiery streak penetrates your skull, trying to force your eyes open. It's a sound. A clarion call from hell.
links.polish: Twoją czaszkę przeszywa ogniste ostrze, próbując zmusić cię do otwarcia oczu. To odgłos. Zew piekielnego trębacza.
links.belarusian: Тваю чэрап пранізвае агністае лязо, спрабуючы прымусіць цябе адчыніць вочы. Гэта гук. Заклік пякельнага трубача.

links.title: Encyclopedia: "Somehow you know what it is -- a Co..."
links.english: Somehow you know what it is -- a Coupris Kineema motor carriage.
links.polish: Z jakiegoś powodu wiesz, co go wydaje – powóz motorowy marki Coupris Kineema.
links.belarusian: Па нейкай прычыне вы ведаеце, што яго выдае – маторная карэта маркі Coupris Kineema.

links.title: You: "[Open your eyes.]"
links.english: [Open your eyes.]
links.polish: [Otwórz oczy].
links.belarusian: [Адкрый вочы].

links.title: You: "Who *am* I? What sort of creature d..."
links.english: Who *am* I? What sort of creature does this to their own mouth?!
links.polish: Kim ja *jestem*? Jakie stworzenie robi takie rzeczy swoim własnym ustom?!
links.belarusian: Хто ж я *ёсць*? Якая істота робіць такія рэчы сваім уласным вуснам?!

links.title: You: "Okay, I'm a bit scared now. Let's g..."
links.english: Okay, I'm a bit scared now. Let's go back to the dark.
links.polish: No dobra, teraz to się trochę boję. Wracajmy do ciemności.
links.belarusian: Добра, цяпер я трохі баюся. Вяртаемся ў цемру.

links.title: You: "Stop! I don't want to hear anything..."
links.english: Stop! I don't want to hear anything more about this *sensation*. Take me back to the formless, disembodied nothing!
links.polish: Dosyć! Nie chcę słyszeć nic więcej o tym *odczuciu*. Chcę wrócić do bezkształtnej, bezcielesnej nicości!
links.belarusian: Досыць! Я не хачу больш нічога чуць пра гэтае *адчуванне*. Я хачу вярнуцца да бясформенай, бязцялеснай нішто!

Alternate1.english: Please, no! I changed my mind! Take me back to the formless, disembodied nothing!
Alternate1.polish: Proszę, nie! Zmieniłem zdanie! Zabierzcie mnie z powrotem do bezkształtnej, bezcielesnej nicości!
Alternate1.belarusian: Калі ласка, не! Я змяніў сваё меркаванне! Вазьміце мяне назад у бясформенную, бязцеласную нішто!

links.title: You: "No, I am not scared, I am a Champio..."
links.english: No, I am not scared, I am a Champion!
links.polish: Nie, nie boję się! Jestem mistrzem!
links.belarusian: Не, не баюся! Я майстар!

links.title: You: "I do. Let me off."
links.english: I do. Let me off.
links.polish: Tak. Wypuść mnie.
links.belarusian: Так. Выпусці мяне.

links.title: Limbic System: "You wouldn't like it if I told you..."
links.english: You wouldn't like it if I told you what's back there. Why do you think you had to bludgeon yourself into oblivion? Or did you not sense yourself -- marinating? Poured so much over yourself... Got a bit *carried away* did we, chef?
links.polish: Nie spodobałoby ci się, gdybym ci powiedział, co tam jest. Jak myślisz, czemu postanowiłeś pogrążyć się w nicości? A może nie poczułeś, jak się tam... marynujesz? Tyle wylałeś na siebie marynaty... Trochę cię chyba *poniosło*, co?
links.belarusian: Табе не спадабалася б, калі б я сказаў табе, што там ёсць. Як думаеш, чаму ты вырашыў апускацца ў нішто? А можа, ты не адчуў, як там... марынаваўся? Столькі на сябе выліў марынаду... Троху цябе, мусіць, *занесла*, так?

links.title: Inland Empire: "Fear and apprehension... You should..."
links.english: Fear and apprehension... You should ask what's out there first.
links.polish: Strach i wahanie... Powinieneś najpierw spytać, co cię tam czeka.
links.belarusian: Страх і ваганні... Ты павінен спачатку спытаць, што цябе там чакае.

links.title: You: "Wait, I did this to myself?"
links.english: Wait, I did this to myself?
links.polish: Zaraz. Ja sam to sobie zrobiłem?
links.belarusian: Зараз. Я сам гэта сабе зрабіў?

links.title: Limbic System: "Yes, you're one disco mother."
links.english: Yes, you're one disco mother.
links.polish: Tak, prawdziwy z ciebie disco-skurwiel.
links.belarusian: Так, сапраўдны з цябе дыскатэкскі злыдзень.

links.title: You: "Tell me, what's waiting for me?"
links.english: Tell me, what's waiting for me?
links.polish: Powiedz, co tam na mnie czeka.
links.belarusian: Скажы, што там мяне чакае.

links.title: Limbic System: "There's this giant ball there. And..."
links.english: There's this giant ball there. And evil apes. And the evil apes are dukin' it out on the ball. You're one of them. It's basically all just evil apes dukin' it out on a giant ball.
links.polish: Jest tam taka wielka kula. I podłe małpiszony. Podłe małpiszony piorące się na kuli. Jesteś jednym z nich. W zasadzie to nie ma tam nic poza podłymi małpiszonami piorącymi się na ogromnej kuli.
links.belarusian: Ёсць там такая вялікая куля. І падлыя малпы. Падлыя малпы прамываюцца на куля. Ты адзін з іх. Увогуле, там няма нічога, акрамя падлых малпаў, якія прамываюцца на велізарнай куля.

links.title: You: "How big is the ball?"
links.english: How big is the ball?
links.polish: Jak wielka jest ta kula?
links.belarusian: Наколькі вялікі гэты шар?

links.title: Limbic System: "You can't even make out it's a ball..."
links.english: You can't even make out it's a ball, when you're dukin' it out. It's that large.
links.polish: Podczas tego całego prania nie da się nawet zauważyć, że to kula. Taka jest wielka.
links.belarusian: Падчас гэтага ўсяго мыцця немагчыма нават заўважыць, што гэта шарык. Такая яна вялікая.

links.title: You: "How small are the apes?"
links.english: How small are the apes?
links.polish: Jak małe są te małpiszony?
links.belarusian: Наколькі малыя гэтыя малпаўкі?

links.title: Limbic System: "Infinitesimally small."
links.english: Infinitesimally small.
links.polish: Nieskończenie małe.
links.belarusian: Бясконца малыя.

links.title: You: "And this *dukin' it out* I keep hea..."
links.english: And this *dukin' it out* I keep hearing about - what's that?
links.polish: A to całe *pranie się*, to co to właściwie jest?
links.belarusian: А што такое гэтае *мыццё сябе*, што гэта насамрэч такое?

links.title: Limbic System: "Vying for resources? It's just a st..."
links.english: Vying for resources? It's just a stupid expression you picked up somewhere. The part of the presentation you want to take home with you is this: you have to beat the other evil apes in the face or you lose.
links.polish: Walka o zasoby? To tylko głupie określenie, które gdzieś usłyszałeś. Najważniejsze, co musisz zapamiętać z mojej prezentacji, to: trzeba walić inne podłe małpiszony w pysk, bo inaczej przegrasz.
links.belarusian: Барацьба за рэсурсы? Гэта толькі глупае вызначэнне, якое ты дзесьці пачуў. Галоўнае, што ты павінен запомніць з маёй прэзентацыі, гэта: трэба біць іншых нізкіх малпаў у твар, бо інакш прайграеш.

links.title: You: "That's sad."
links.english: That's sad.
links.polish: Smutne.
links.belarusian: Сумна.

links.title: Limbic System: "Yes, it is. And you drowned in that..."
links.english: Yes, it is. And you drowned in that sadness a long time ago.
links.polish: Tak, smutne. A ty już dawno temu utonąłeś w tym smutku.
links.belarusian: Так, сумна. А ты ўжо даўно патануў у гэтым смутку.

links.title: You: "What do you mean *drowned*?"
links.english: What do you mean *drowned*?
links.polish: Jak to *utonąłem*?
links.belarusian: Як гэта *патануў*?

links.title: Limbic System: "You lost."
links.english: You lost.
links.polish: Przegrałeś.
links.belarusian: Ты прайграў.

links.title: Encyclopedia: "The sound outside -- you recognize..."
links.english: The sound outside -- you recognize it. It's a Coupris Kineema motor carriage.
links.polish: Ten dźwięk na zewnątrz... Rozpoznajesz go. To powóz motorowy marki Coupris Kineema.
links.belarusian: Гэты гук звонку... Ты яго пазнаеш. Гэта маторная карэта маркі Coupris Kineema.

links.title: You: "That sounds like something I would..."
links.english: That sounds like something I would like to do -- let's go!
links.polish: Brzmi to jak coś, na co miałbym ochotę. W drogę!
links.belarusian: Гэта гучыць як тое, што мне хацелася б зрабіць. Наперад!

links.title: You: "I don't care, I'm an idiot. A brave..."
links.english: I don't care, I'm an idiot. A brave idiot.
links.polish: Nie szkodzi. Jestem durniem. Odważnym durniem.
links.belarusian: Нічога страшнага. Я дурань. Адважны дурань.

links.title: Ancient Reptilian Brain: "Somewhere in the sore, bloated man-..."
links.english: Somewhere in the sore, bloated man-meat around you -- *a sensation*!
links.polish: Gdzieś w otaczającym cię obolałym, zapuchniętym ludzkim mięsie... *odczucie*!
links.belarusian: Недзе ў атачальным цябе балючым, апухлым чалавечым мясе... *адчуванне*!

links.title: You: "What was that about the *ex-* somet..."
links.english: What was that about the *ex-* something?
links.polish: Co to tam było o tym *eks-czymś*?
links.belarusian: Што гэта там было пра тое *экс-што-небудзь*?

links.title: Limbic System: "An awareness creeps up on you. A ma..."
links.english: An awareness creeps up on you. A mass lies hidden in your dead angle, soaking in some lurid, acidic sauce. It's bloated and shameful, a ball of meat surrounding you... This is a terrible line of questioning, and it will only lead to more awareness of the meat-thing.
links.polish: Znienacka podkrada się do ciebie świadomość. W twojej martwej strefie ukryła się jakaś masa nasiąknięta upiornym, kwaśnym sosem. Jest zapuchnięta i godna pożałowania, ta otaczająca cię kula mięsa... Zadajesz fatalne pytania, które doprowadzą tylko do wzrostu świadomości tego mięcha.
links.belarusian: Знянацку падкрадаецца да цябе свядомасць. У тваю мёртвую зону схавалася нейкая маса, насычана злавесным, кіславатым соусам. Яна напухлая і вартая спачування, гэтая атачаючая цябе куля мяса... Ты задаеш фатальныя пытанні, якія толькі павялічаць свядомасць гэтага мяса.

links.title: You: "(Plunge back into the fathomless de..."
links.english: (Plunge back into the fathomless deep.)
links.polish: (Rzuć się ponownie w niezmierzoną głębię).
links.belarusian: (Кінься зноў у немераную глыбіню).

links.title: Ancient Reptilian Brain: "There. No ball of meat, no light in..."
links.english: There. No ball of meat, no light in the formless nothing. Just nightswimming!
links.polish: Już. Żadnych kul mięsa, żadnego światła w bezkształtnej nicości. Tylko pławienie się w nocy!
links.belarusian: Ужо. Ніякіх мясаў, ніякага святла ў бясформенным нішто. Толькі пагружэнне ў ноч!

links.title: You: "No, I wanted to know about the ex-s..."
links.english: No, I wanted to know about the ex-something.
links.polish: Nie, nie, chcę się dowiedzieć więcej o tym eks-czymś.
links.belarusian: Не, не, хачу даведацца больш пра гэтае экс-нешта.

links.title: Ancient Reptilian Brain: "Ex-love, ex-tenderness. It is fooli..."
links.english: Ex-love, ex-tenderness. It is foolish of you to resurface to the loss. Not after all the damage you suffered to get here, some of it irreversible... Stay, sail with me through the Abyssopelagic Zone!
links.polish: Eks-miłość, eks-czułość. Głupotą jest wynurzać się ku stracie. Zwłaszcza po tych wszystkich szkodach, jakie sobie zadałeś, żeby się tu dostać. Niektórych nieodwracalnych... Zostań tu, żegluj ze mną w strefie abisalnej!
links.belarusian: Былая любоў, былая пяшчота. Глупствам ёсць выплываць да страты. Асабліва пасля ўсіх тых шкод, якія ты сабе нанес, каб сюды дабрацца. Некаторых незваротных... Застанься тут, плавай са мной у абісальнай зоне!

links.title: You: "Allons-y! Never let me go!"
links.english: Allons-y! Never let me go!
links.polish: Allons-y! Nie daj mi stąd odejść!
links.belarusian: Allons-y! Не дазваляй мне адсюль сыходзіць!

links.title: You: "No, I want to get off now. I like p..."
links.english: No, I want to get off now. I like pain and burning light and wanting things from people who don't want to give them to me.
links.polish: Nie. Chcę już wysiąść. Lubię ból i palące światło i lubię też chcieć od ludzi rzeczy, których nie chcą mi dać.
links.belarusian: Не. Хачу ўжо выйсці. Мне падабаецца боль і пякучае святло, і мне таксама падабаецца жадаць ад людзей рэчаў, якія яны не хочуць мне даваць.
